data.event: Bell is an incorporated city in Los Angeles County, California, near the center of the former San Antonio Township (abolished after 1960).
In 2007, the U.S. Census Bureau ranked Bell's land area at 1245 out of 1257 cities (defined as incorporated areas) and two unincorporated areas that had a population of at least 25,000 in year 2000.

event.title: a special municipal election on November 29, 2005

data.event: City residents voted to become a charter city in a special municipal election on November 29, 2005.
